alert.note: Alert for Delta; Dickinson; Menominee (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 28 at 5:00PM EDT by NWS Marquette
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern Dickinson, west central Delta and northern Menominee Counties through 530 PM EDT/430 PM CDT/... At 500 PM EDT/400 PM CDT/, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Norway, or 8 miles east of Iron Mountain, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Hermansville around 415 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include La Branche. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 900 PM EDT/800 PM CDT/ for south central Upper Michigan.
